name: Word Tower - FREE
description:
By creating words protect your Word Tower as long as possible!

How to play: Tap on the letters to create words with at least 3 characters each! Match the color of the first letter to get the combo points and new letters you will play with, otherwise your tower will be damaged.

*** Game modes ***
Classic mode - protect the word tower as long as you can by creating words built from the same colors as the first letter in your word, if you do not match the colors then your tower will be damaged! Protect your tower as long as possible and submit your score at the end of the game!

Time Attack - you have exactly 300 seconds to get the best score possible!

Fast - no new letters added when performing combos!

Features:
* Addicting and original word search game
* Over 170 000 words included
* 3 game modes
* Global leaderboards included
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases

Please rate the game or leave a comment if you want to support it!

Have a nice time playing Word Tower!
